what_is.title: What is GrainTrade?
what_is.description: GrainTrade.info is a modern online exchange for farmers and grain traders. Here you can buy grain wholesale, sell grain, find reliable partners and negotiate deals directly, without unnecessary intermediaries.

items.question: How to register on GrainTrade?
items.answer: Registration is simple and free. Click 'Register' button, fill in your details, and verify your email address.

items.question: Is it safe to use the platform?
items.answer: Yes, we use secure payment systems and verify all users. All transactions are protected.

items.question: What grain types can I trade?
items.answer: You can trade all major grain types: wheat, corn, barley, sunflower seeds, soybeans, and other agricultural products.

items.question: Are there any fees?
items.answer: Basic platform usage is free. We only charge a small commission on completed transactions.

items.question: How does the map search work?
items.answer: Our map search shows all available offers in your area. You can filter by grain type, quantity, and distance.
